Package org.action.application

Class ApplicationManager

java.lang.Object
org.action.application.ApplicationManager
public class ApplicationManager extends Object
This class handles CRUD operations for applications, including storing applications, filtering and retrieving applications, processing approvals, rejections, and withdrawals. It also provides reporting capabilities for booking receipts.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApplicationManager()
    Constructs a new ApplicationManager which loads existing applications from CSV.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationManager

      public ApplicationManager()
      Constructs a new ApplicationManager which loads existing applications from CSV. Initializes the application list and populates it with data from the file.

  • Method Details

    • store

      public void store()
      Stores all applications to the CSV file. This method should be called when exiting the program to ensure data persistence.

    • listByUser

      public List<String> listByUser(user usr, EnquiriesManager enqMan, ProjectManager proMan)
      Lists all applications for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user whose applications are being listed
      enqMan - The EnquiriesManager to retrieve project details
      proMan - The ProjectManager to retrieve project details
      Returns:
      List of formatted strings containing application details

    • listByProject

      public List<String> listByProject(user usr, String projectId)
      Lists all applications for a specific project. If the user is an Applicant, only their own applications for the project are shown. If the user is an HDBOfficer, all applications for the project are shown.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the list
      projectId - The ID of the project to list applications for
      Returns:
      List of formatted strings containing application details

    • checkForOfficer

      public int checkForOfficer(user usr, String projectId)
      Checks if a user has any active applications for a specific project. Used to verify if an HDB officer is eligible to process applications.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user to check
      projectId - The project ID to check against
      Returns:
      Number of active applications for the user on this project

    • newApplication

      public void newApplication(user usr, String projectId, String flatType, ProjectManager proMan)
      Creates a new application for a user. Checks if the user is eligible to apply (e.g., not an officer of the project) and if they don't already have an active application.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user creating the application
      projectId - The ID of the project being applied for
      flatType - The type of flat being applied for
      proMan - The ProjectManager to verify project details

    • processApplicationOptions

      public List<String> processApplicationOptions(String applicationId)
      The options for each Application
      Parameters:
      applicationId - Unique Application ID for the application
      Returns:
      the respectively Cancel or SUCCESSFUL or CANCEL or BOOKED

    • processApplication

      public void processApplication(user usr, String applicationId, String action, ProjectManager proMan)
      Processes an application's status change. Only HDB officers assigned to the project can process applications. Available actions are: BOOKED, SUCCESSFUL, UNSUCCESSFUL.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user processing the application (must be an HDBOfficer)
      applicationId - The ID of the application to process
      action - The action to perform (status to change to)
      proMan - The ProjectManager to verify project details

    • processWithdrawal

      public void processWithdrawal(user usr, String applicationId, String action, ProjectManager proMan)
      Processes a withdrawal request for an application. Only HDB officers assigned to the project can process withdrawal requests. Available actions are: WITHDRAW (approve), REJECT (reject withdrawal).
      Parameters:
      usr - The user processing the withdrawal (must be an HDBOfficer)
      applicationId - The ID of the application with withdrawal request
      action - The action to perform (WITHDRAW or REJECT)
      proMan - The ProjectManager to verify project details

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal(user usr, String applicationId)
      Submits a withdrawal request for an application. Only the applicant who owns the application can request withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      usr - The applicant requesting withdrawal
      applicationId - The ID of the application to withdraw

    • getBookingReceipts

      public List<BookingReceipt> getBookingReceipts(user actor, String projectFilter, String flatTypeFilter, String maritalFilter, ProjectManager proMan, List<GenericManager<user>> managersList)
      Generates booking receipts based on filter criteria. This is used for reporting on booked applications.
      Parameters:
      actor - The user requesting the report
      projectFilter - Filter by project name (empty string to ignore)
      flatTypeFilter - Filter by flat type (empty string to ignore)
      maritalFilter - Filter by marital status (empty string to ignore)
      proMan - The ProjectManager to retrieve project details
      managersList - List of GenericManager to retrieve user details by user ID
      Returns:
      List of BookingReceipt objects matching the filter criteria

    • getApplicationList

      public List<Application> getApplicationList()
      Gets the complete list of applications managed by this ApplicationManager.
      Returns:
      The list of all Application objects
